Property Documentation

- (NSString *) alarmName [read, write, retain]

The descriptive name for the alarm.

This name must be unique within the user's AWS account. The maximum length is 255 characters.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 255

- (NSString *) stateReason [read, write, retain]

The reason that this alarm is set to this specific state (in human-readable text format).

Constraints:
Length: 0 - 1023

- (NSString *) stateReasonData [read, write, retain]

The reason that this alarm is set to this specific state (in machine-readable JSON format).

Constraints:
Length: 0 - 4000

- (NSString *) stateValue [read, write, retain]

The value of the state.

Constraints:
Allowed Values: OK, ALARM, INSUFFICIENT_DATA
